Description:
Detects when an a role is modified or deleted in Google Workspace.

Author: Austin Songer
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Google Workspace Role Modified or Deleted
Query: sourcetype="gcp-google_workspace.admin" eventservice="admin.googleapis.com" (eventname="DELETE_ROLE" OR eventname="RENAME_ROLE" OR eventname="UPDATE_ROLE")
